Controllers
Monica Bolles
About Art Controllers Production Sound

Controllers

  • 2017

    Universal Mind Control

    Control the Universe with your mind! App built to allow the user to train different brainstates to control varying functions in the planetarium software Uniview.
  • 2017

    Brainwaves Dress

    A dress that is controlled by your brainwaves. Featured in the multimedia performance Resonant.
  • 2017

    Face Trax

    Ever wanted to control the mix of a song with your face? Well now you can with Face Trax. Give it a shot. You'll never want to mix a song with faders again.
  • 2016

    3D Sound Panner

    A controller that allows you to pan sound in a 3D space.
